trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: As a bonus action, the priestess can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priestess expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@damage 1d6} for each level above 1st.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The junior drow priestessess of lolth has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the junior drow priestessess of lolth to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the junior drow priestessess of lolth has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
